description:
Embrace and uphold Ibotta's Core Values:
Integrity, Boldness, Ownership, Teamwork, Transparency & Advocate for Savers Drive resolution of complex problems by bringing in others and leading process Hire, coach and develop a team of sales professionals to achieve their gross profit and professional growth goals Delegate effectively and focus almost exclusively on strategy impacting the broader business Beat annual revenue targets through the development, advancement, and closure of partnerships and execution of new businesses and expansion of existing business Develop and deliver sales presentations that educate prospective clients on Ibotta's value proposition, roadmap, and partnership opportunities Execute and deliver on initiatives (commonly cross-functional) that provide business impact beyond team's accounts Work closely with other functional teams to ensure client partnerships are successfully executed from start to finish Develop and implement account strategy as needed Travel up to 40% (when it is safe to do so). Note, we are remote for the foreseeable future due to the impact of COVID-19 What we are looking for:
8-11 years of experience in a data driven sales role 2-3 years of experience as a people manager or demonstrated leadership abilities Bachelor's degree preferred Experience selling digital, mobile, or media advertising solutions into verticals such as CPG preferred Proven ability to sell into high-level leadership (including C-level) and to navigate potential customer organizations to connect with the business owner/decision maker Great communication skills, both written and verbal (candidates do a mock pitch as part of the hiring process) Excellent negotiation skills with a demonstrated ability to close the deal Outstanding leadership abilities and proven success as a leader with a large or high-growth organization, ability to coach varying skill levels Flexibility, accountability, and resourcefulness, to work with little direction in a fast-paced startup environment. Ability to think and act like an entrepreneur, utilizing creative thinking to deliver value to your stakeholders analytical skills:
ability to measure the results of your team's work
Salary Range:
$150K -- $200K
Minimum Qualification
Account Management, Sales Management & OperationsEstimated Salary: $20 to $28 per hour based on qualifications.
